mapper.update: update market set count = count+1 where market_no = #{marketNo} and status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select market_no , market_title , market_writer , market_content , to_char(market_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as market_date , market_section , price , p_img as productImg , p_like , count , origin_name , change_name from market mk left outer join board_file on(market_no = ref_bno) where market_no = #{marketNo} and mk.status = 'Y'
